name: Ironmonger
description: A place where raw materials are processed or crafted; adventurers might secure specialized equipment or investigate hazardous machinery.
atmosphere: The workshop is filled with the metallic scent of iron and the sharp tang of hot metal. The sound of hammers striking iron and the rhythmic work of metal crafting creates a methodical, industrious atmosphere. The air carries the promise of strength and the essential nature of metalwork in daily life.
